short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered emoji picker with smart, context-aware suggestions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your emotions into emoji - without stopping writing.

⚠️ The OpenAI API key is required for the AI integration - pass it in the Options page and start writing! ⚠️

━ Features ━

✅ FREE - without ads
🔥 3,000+ latest emojis - Unicode 15.0 compatible
🌐 Simple, but efficient ":" trigger
✨ AI autosuggestions - available wherever you're writing
⚡ Instant picker in every input you’re typing in
🌙 Light and dark mode support
🗒️ Compatible with EVERY platform, including Twitter, LinkedIn, Reddit and many more
🔍 Easy search - misspelling a word would still show what you’re looking for
🚀 Performant - the extension isn't impacting website performance

━ Usage ━

EmojAI is a fully FREE extension! Just install it and it'll be with you whenever you want to write.

━ Contact ━

You have an issue or want to give a feedback / suggestion? Drop me an email 📬

━ Privacy ━

The extension doesn't collect any data.
